titleStmt.title: The young-mans lamentation: containing, his passionate complaint of his unconstant lover; together, with his resolution to leave her who scornfully slighted him. : To an excellent new tune, or, Over hills and high mountains. / Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
